meanings.sent1: The mozos played soccer in the park.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of mozos playing basketball.
meanings.sent3: The mozos raced each other to the finish line.
meanings.sent4: The mozos were like a pack of energetic puppies.
meanings.sent5: The mozos were full of youthful energy and enthusiasm.

meanings.definition: A waiter or servant in a restaurant.
meanings.sent1: The friendly mozos served delicious food at the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: I called the mozos to bring us more water.
meanings.sent3: The mozos juggled plates and glasses for fun.
meanings.sent4: The mozos moved around the tables gracefully like dancers.
meanings.sent5: The mozos made sure every guest felt welcome and well-fed.

meanings.definition: A group of people working together.
meanings.sent1: The mozos collaborated to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent2: The mozos organized a charity event for the community.
meanings.sent3: The mozos formed a human pyramid just for laughs.
meanings.sent4: The mozos were a well-oiled machine, completing tasks efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The mozos showed great teamwork and achieved success together.
